title: Save an extra 20% off this giant Microsoft app collection for handling all your online projects
content:
Macworld

There’s no telling what program you may need to complete your most in-demand professional and personal projects. Thankfully, there’s almost always a Microsoft app that can help get that project over the finish line. And equally, thankfully, there’s a good chance that the app is included in this expansive Microsoft collection featuring Microsoft Office, Project, and Visio, as well as Microsoft Windows 11 Pro. Get the bundle on sale for an extra 20% off through March 10th with code ENJOY20. 

For starters, consider the benefits of upgrading to Windows 11 Pro, an operating system socked with all kinds of enhanced security features like Bitlocker device encryption, biometric logins, and more.

From that solid foundation, Microsoft Office 2019 comes with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, and Access for creating everything from documents and presentations to spreadsheets, databases, and beyond.

While most people understand what’s available in Microsoft Office, far fewer are up to speed on two more sneaky useful Microsoft apps, Project 2019 and Visio 2019.

With Project, users get a full-service project management tool so users can create timelines, build from templates, submit timesheets, and craft visually engaging schedules and workflows for getting projects finished right.

With Visio, diagramming takes center stage, turning large, complicated data sets into intuitive, easily understandable flowcharts, hierarchy trees, and more.

This wide-ranging Microsoft Windows/Office/Project/Visio collection would usually retail at $927, but right now, it’s also on sale at 20% off the already discounted price. Just use the codeword ENJOY20 during checkout and complete your purchase by 11:59 p.m. PT on Sun., Mar. 10 to get the Ultimate 2019 Microsoft Bundle: Office, Project, Visio and Windows 11 Pro for just $79.99.
